summary: Hello. This little mod change Gregor (Housecarl of Heljarchen Hall) to female (Grace) and improve Oriella the bard because i dont like him walking around my house, so i change him with CK and make a nice Bard & Female Housecarl.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#00ffff][size=6][u]FEMALES[/u] [u]IN[/u] [u]THE[/u] [u]PALE[/u][/size][/color][/font][/b]

[b][color=#6d9eeb][u]°Required Heartfires[/u][/color][/b]

[b][color=#d8d8d8]Hello.[/color][/b]

[b][size=3][color=#d8d8d8]This little mod change [/color][u][color=#f4f4f4]Gregor[/color][/u][color=#d8d8d8] (Housecarl of Heljarchen Hall) to female ([/color][color=#f4f4f4][u]Grace[/u][/color][color=#d8d8d8]) and improve [/color][u][color=#f4f4f4]Oriella the Bard[/color][/u][color=#d8d8d8], because i dont like him walking around my house, so i change him with CK and make a nice Bard & Female Housecarl.[/color][/size]

[color=#d8d8d8]This had been tested and works fine, no issues ;)[/color][/b]

[b][color=#ffff00](Please if you download my mod, upload some pics because this need pics!!!!... i cant play Skyrim right now. Thank you.)

[/color][/b][color=#ff7700]EDIT: Thank you Fodenflier for the pictures :D[/color]

[b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00]Have a nice day[/color][/font][/size][/b][/center][b][size=4][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ff00][/color][/font][/center][/size][/b]
author: Esdras TheExMaverik
